definitions.definition: A part broken off; a small, detached portion; an imperfect part, either physically or not
definitions.example: I heard a small fragment of the conversation.

definitions.definition: (grammar) A sentence not containing a subject or a predicate.
A portion of a URL referring to a subordinate resource (such as a specific point on a web page), introduced by the # sign.
To cause to be broken into pieces.
To break up and disperse (a file) into non-contiguous areas of a disk.
